testcase.name: To create a account for a new customer - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Open the browser and go the store URL.................................passed And Select the Create An Account option.....................................passed When Enter the "Spring" and "Potato" under personal information.............passed And Enter the "lumatestingdemo@gmail.com" and "Hello@12345" under sign-in information.passed And Again re-enter the same password in "Hello@12345".......................passed Then Click on Create An Accounts............................................passed And Check for the "Thank you for registering with Main Website Store."......passed
